After Ino kicks the opponent in the face and throws a [[Ninja Wolfsbane|wolfbane]], she twirls elegantly around in the air and throws a barrage of poisonous purple flowers at the opponent. The flowers explode upon impact, releasing a shower of poisonous mist and purple petals.
